name: Defenders of Cardom
description:
Defenders of Cardom is a deck-builder tower defense game. You play as The Squire, who is on a quest to stop The Dark Lord's reign of terror!

Strategic Deck Building!



Build a starting deck and refine your strategy in order to defend against hand-crafted waves of enemies!

Hone and adapt your strategy mid-level with deck-builder roguelite inspired deck building, which creates varied playthroughs, even on the same level!

Adventure Across Cardom!

Freely explore the world of Cardom in the hub-world, which incorporates RPG elements in order to tell the unfolding story of the Defenders of Cardom!
Meet quirky characters and learn about the light-hearted, slightly satirical, kingdom of Cardom (or not, the story is totally optional).

Unique Levels!

Every level has its own unique boss, map, waves, and sometimes even mechanics! Each level provides a fresh experience, whether it be with the level-exclusive boss fight, or interactable objects with special mechanics, each level has something new!


Not enough levels for you?
Play forever in Endless Mode, which has its own unique maps and carefully crafted, procedural wave generation, providing limitless content!

Tons of Cards!

During your adventure, you can unlock dozens of different cards! Every card unlocked brings a whole new world of strategic opportunity!




Hero cards are your "towers". Using their unique abilities and attacks, they each fill their own distinct role in your defense!



Enchantment cards enhance a heroes abilities when used. Unlike other tower defense games, upgrades can be applied to any hero in a sandbox style upgrade system!



Spell cards are flashy, fun, and satisfying effects! They vary from small utility effects, helpful boosts, and some can even wipe out entire waves!

Mix up the way you play!


Customize and vary your playstyle with one of many relics, which each give a distinct bonus, but not without a drawback...

Key Features!

  • Strategic, synergy based, deckbuilding!
  • Real-time, satisfying tower defense!
  • Freely explore Cardom and uncover secrets!
  • Hand-crafted waves and maps!
  • Think you've mastered the game? Challenge yourself in optional, extra difficult, max spiciness levels!
